resources.string: Fill in the grid by marking cells with ✓ or ✗ based on the clues provided. Each row and column should have exactly one ✓.

string-array.name: easy_clues
string-array.item: The cat likes to sleep in the sunny spot
The dog prefers to play in the garden
The fish swims happily in the water
Red is next to Blue, but not Yellow
Green is between Yellow and Blue
Yellow shines brightest in the morning
The pizza is hot and fresh from the oven
The ice cream needs to stay cold
The sandwich is perfect for lunch time
The sun makes rainbows after the rain
Snow falls only in winter
Stars twinkle in the night sky

string-array.name: medium_clues
string-array.item: Math class comes before Art, but after Science
Music is played when English class ends
History is the first class of the day
PE class needs the big gym space
The bicycle is faster than walking
The bus arrives after the train leaves
The car must stop at red lights
The airplane flies high above the clouds
Spring brings colorful flowers
Summer is perfect for beach days
Fall makes leaves change colors
Winter brings snowmen and hot cocoa

string-array.name: hard_clues
string-array.item: The basketball team plays in the big court
Soccer practice happens after swimming
Tennis matches need sunny weather
The running track is always open first
Volleyball nets are set up last
The cake comes after singing
Games are played before presents
Decorations go up first thing
Photos are taken right after cake
Dancing happens at the very end
Lions roar before the monkeys wake
Penguins swim after lunch time
Elephants spray water in the afternoon
Giraffes eat leaves all morning long
Pandas rest during the busy noon hour
